org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.OperationObserver

Packages that use OperationObserver

Uses of OperationObserver in org.objectstyle.cayenne.access
 

Classes in org.objectstyle.cayenne.access that implement OperationObserver
 class QueryResult
          QueryResult encapsulates a result of execution of zero or more queries using QueryEngine.
 

Methods in org.objectstyle.cayenne.access with parameters of type OperationObserver
 void Transaction.performQueries(QueryEngine engine, java.util.Collection queries, OperationObserver observer)
          Helper method that wraps a number of queries in this transaction, runs them, and commits or rolls back depending on the outcome.
 void QueryEngine.performQueries(java.util.Collection queries, OperationObserver resultConsumer, Transaction transaction)
          Executes queries in the transactional context provided by the caller.
 void QueryEngine.performQueries(java.util.Collection queries, OperationObserver resultConsumer)
          Executes a list of queries wrapping them in its own transaction.
 void QueryEngine.performQuery(Query query, OperationObserver resultConsumer)
          Deprecated. Since 1.1 use QueryEngine.performQueries(java.util.Collection,OperationObserver,Transaction)
 void DataNode.performQueries(java.util.Collection queries, OperationObserver observer)
          Wraps queries in an internal transaction, and executes them via connection obtained from internal DataSource.
 void DataNode.performQuery(Query query, OperationObserver operationObserver)
          Deprecated. Since 1.1 use performQueries(List, OperationObserver). This method is redundant and doesn't add value.
 void DataNode.performQueries(java.util.Collection queries, OperationObserver resultConsumer, Transaction transaction)
          Runs queries using Connection obtained from internal DataSource.
protected  void DataNode.runSelect(java.sql.Connection connection, Query query, OperationObserver delegate)
          Executes select query.
protected  void DataNode.runUpdate(java.sql.Connection con, Query query, OperationObserver delegate)
          Executes a non-batched update query (including UPDATE, DELETE, INSERT, etc.).
protected  void DataNode.runBatchUpdate(java.sql.Connection con, BatchQuery query, OperationObserver delegate)
          Executes a BatchQuery (including UPDATE, DELETE, INSERT, etc.).
protected  void DataNode.runBatchUpdateAsBatch(java.sql.Connection con, BatchQuery query, BatchQueryBuilder queryBuilder, OperationObserver delegate)
          Executes batch query using JDBC Statement batching features.
protected  void DataNode.runBatchUpdateAsIndividualQueries(java.sql.Connection con, BatchQuery query, BatchQueryBuilder queryBuilder, OperationObserver delegate)
          Executes batch query without using JDBC Statement batching features, running individual statements in the batch one by one.
protected  void DataNode.runStoredProcedure(java.sql.Connection con, Query query, OperationObserver delegate)
           
protected  void DataNode.readStoredProcedureOutParameters(java.sql.CallableStatement statement, ResultDescriptor descriptor, Query query, OperationObserver delegate)
          Helper method that reads OUT parameters of a CallableStatement.
protected  void DataNode.readResultSet(java.sql.ResultSet resultSet, ResultDescriptor descriptor, GenericSelectQuery query, OperationObserver delegate)
          Helper method that reads a ResultSet.
 void DataDomain.performQueries(java.util.Collection queries, OperationObserver resultConsumer, Transaction transaction)
          Inspects the queries, sending them to appropriate DataNodes for execution.
 void DataDomain.performQueries(java.util.Collection queries, OperationObserver observer)
          Wraps queries in an internal transaction and sends them to appropriate DataNodes for execution.
 void DataDomain.performQuery(Query query, OperationObserver operationObserver)
          Deprecated. Since 1.1 use DataDomain.performQueries(java.util.Collection,OperationObserver,Transaction)
 void DataContext.performQueries(java.util.Collection queries, OperationObserver observer)
          Delegates queries execution to parent QueryEngine.
 void DataContext.performQueries(java.util.Collection queries, OperationObserver resultConsumer, Transaction transaction)
          Delegates queries execution to parent QueryEngine.
 void DataContext.performQuery(Query query, OperationObserver operationObserver)
          Deprecated. Since 1.1 use performQueries(List, OperationObserver). This method is redundant and doesn't add value.

          Runs a SQLTemplate query as a select.

Uses of OperationObserver in org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.util
 

Classes in org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.util that implement OperationObserver
 class ContextCommitObserver
          ContextCommitObserver is used as an observer for DataContext commit operations.
 class ContextSelectObserver
          Deprecated. Since 1.1 Cayenne internally uses a superclass SelectObserver that has all needed functionality to convert rows to objects.
 class DefaultOperationObserver
          Simple implementation of OperationObserver interface.
 class IteratedSelectObserver
          OperationObserver that is used to track the execution of SelectQueries with results returned as ResultIterator.
 class SelectObserver
          OperationObserver that accumulates select query results provided by callback methods.

protected  class JdbcPkGenerator.PkRetrieveProcessor
          OperationObserver for primary key retrieval.
 

Methods in org.objectstyle.cayenne.dba with parameters of type OperationObserver
 boolean JdbcAdapter.shouldRunBatchQuery(DataNode node, java.sql.Connection con, BatchQuery query, OperationObserver delegate)
          Always returns true, letting DataNode to handle the query.
 boolean DbAdapter.shouldRunBatchQuery(DataNode node, java.sql.Connection con, BatchQuery query, OperationObserver delegate)
          Invoked by DataNode, allowing adapter to customize the execution path for the BatchQuery.
